name: III. “VENUS Y AMOR”
description:
3/4 from the “REVIVAL” collection.
REVIVAL is a NFT collection that was born with the purpose of reviving important portions of art history that were silenced and deteriorated by the passage of time.
An alchemical process that connects with spirits that left the earthly plane in past times.

Description of the piece:
Venus seated on a cloud with Cupid at her side. In the background, on the right side, the goddess in her chariot pulled by two swans. At the bottom, two small scenes of Paris and Venus.
Immenso nostrum spectatur numen in orbe, / Et magnam passim vim meus ignis habet. // Non Dij, non homines ulli mea spicula vitant, / His vosucres figo, squamigerumq genus.
- Goltzius, Hendrik. 1596.

AS ABOVE, SO BELOW.

1535x2000px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/revival
